settings.worldName: String: Visible name of the world
settings.worldDescription: String: Visible description of the world
settings.playerTexture: String: The appearance of the player. Must be in ENTITIES LIBRARY

generationAxes.primary: String: The primary axis when generating biomes. Drastic changes here will create entirely different worlds (e.g., 'TEMPERATURE', 'WEALTH', 'CORRUPTION')
generationAxes.secondary: String: The secondary axis when generating biomes. Changes here create distinct areas but maintain the core world identity (e.g., 'HUMIDITY', 'CRIME RATE', 'TECHNOLOGY')
generationAxes.tertiary: String: The tertiary axis when generating biomes. Changes here add unique local characteristics without altering the main region (e.g., 'ALTITUDE', 'MAGIC', 'DANGER')

biomes.biomeName: String: Visible name of this biome
biomes.biomeDescription: String: Visible description of this biome
biomes.biomeType: String: Generation type of this biome. Must be one of: 'REGION' (base layer), 'ABOVE' (rarer, sits on top of 'REGION')

generationAxes.primary: Number (0.0 to 1.0): The ideal value on the Primary Axis for this biome. Make sure biomes cover everything from 0.0 to 1.0
generationAxes.secondary: Number (0.0 to 1.0): The ideal value on the Secondary Axis for this biome. Make sure biomes cover everything from 0.0 to 1.0
generationAxes.tertiary: Number (0.0 to 1.0): The ideal value on the Tertiary Axis for this biome. Make sure biomes cover everything from 0.0 to 1.0

biomes.rarity: Number: 0.5 (very common) to 0.99 (extremely rare). Only for 'ABOVE' biome type

visuals.groundColor: String: Hex color (#rrggbb) for the floor/terrain in this biome
visuals.groundNoiseIntensity: Number: Defines how noisy the ground looks in this biome. Must be from 0.01 (smooth/flat) to 0.2 (very noisy/rocky)

props.texture: String: The appearance of the prop. Must be in OBJECTS LIBRARY
props.density: Number: Density of this prop in each chunk. Must be between 0.001 (rare) and 1.0 (extremely dense)

entities.texture: String: The appearance of this entity. Must be in ENTITIES LIBRARY
entities.displayName: String (Optional): The visible name of this entity. Set to NULL if entity is generic.
entities.density: Number: Density of this entity in each chunk. Must be between 0.001 (rare) and 1.0 (extremely dense)
traits: String: The behavior of this entity. Choose all that apply from: 'AGGRESSIVE' (attacks player on sight), 'REGENERATIVE' (passive heal & flees player when health too low), 'COWARD' (flees when health too low), 'SKITTISH' (flees if player approaches), 'WANDERER' (moves aimlessly), 'COMPANION' (follows player at medium distance), 'STALKER' (watches player from a distance, flees if approached), 'VULTURE' (attacks only if player health is low), 'VIPER' (slowly weaves towards player, then attacks by charging at them)

stats.health: String: The health of this entity. Must be one of: 'VERY LOW', 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH', 'VERY HIGH'
stats.movementSpeed: String: The speed at which this entity moves. Must be one of: 'VERY LOW', 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH', 'VERY HIGH'
stats.visionRange: String: The vision range of this entity. Must be one of: 'VERY LOW', 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH', 'VERY HIGH'

structures.layout: String: The type of this structure. Must be in STRUCTURES LIBRARY
structures.density: Number: Density of this structure in each chunk. Must be between 0.001 (rare) and 1.0 (extremely dense)

walls.texture: String: The wall pattern of this structure. Must be in TILES LIBRARY
walls.color: String: Hex color (#rrggbb) for the walls of this structure

floors.texture: String: The floor pattern of this structure. Must be in TILES LIBRARY
floors.color: String: Hex color (#rrggbb) for the floors of this structure
